snippet.title: Drake - Official Trailer | Realms Deep 2023
snippet.description: Take a look at the Space Western universe of Drake in this trailer for the upcoming top-down action RPG. Check out the trailer to see some of the features you can expect from Drake, including branching dialogues, stealth and engineering puzzles, the real-time combat system, and more. Shape your own story and decide the fate of a distant planet, Drake, when the game launches on Steam.
